sentences.sContent: Each comb plate is a simple rectangular paddle composed of cilia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each comb plate is a simple rectangular paddle composed of cilia.
sentences.sCn: 每个栉板都是纤毛组成的矩形的桨。

sentences.sContent: Many protoctistans are motile, using pseudopodia, cilia or flagella.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many protoctistans are motile, using pseudopodia, cilia or flagella.
sentences.sCn: 许多原生动物利用伪足、纤毛或鞭毛能运动。

sentences.sContent: Healthy, skin, mucous membranes, and cilia are natural barriers to many viruses.
sentences.sContent_eng: Healthy, skin, mucous membranes, and cilia are natural barriers to many viruses.
sentences.sCn: 健康的皮肤，粘膜和纤毛是许多病毒的天然屏障。
